channel.title: ..::..:..::~@¤..::project EVOLUTION PK V2::..¤@~:~now hiring CODERS~..::..:..::
channel.description:
hello, i just finished my v2 of evolution pk this server has emotes that work!..::..:..::this time they actually do sumin lol..::..:..:: this server is pking everywhere exept the bank and training spot but this server is pretty much perfect except we do not have a commands list but we have ..::COMMANDS!::.. we have everything working full ..::DHAROKS::.. & ..::AHRIMS::.. & everykind of barrows lol..:} we are now hiring coders! for server mainly we only need 1 or another to back em up:P so mainly we are done just need a lil adjustments so if your interested in coding my v2 it would be very appreciated so if your interested just reply back to this post:P
rules to server aswell :no massing,no no-cliping, everything is pretty much available so thanks!
..::..:..::RULES TO THIS THREAD..::..:..:: 1.no flaming 2.no spaming 3.follow the rest of ..::MOPARSCAPES::.. rules!!!
